scripts.dev:wrangler: npm run db:init && npm run db:seed && wrangler pages dev dist --local --port=8788 --live-reload
scripts.dev:all: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --kill-others "npm run dev:wrangler" "npm run dev:wait && npm run dev"
scripts.db:verify: wrangler d1 execute francekhalil-db --local --command "SELECT * FROM articles LIMIT 3"
scripts.db:remote:verify: wrangler d1 execute francekhalil-db --remote --command "SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM articles"
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:init && npm run db:sync
scripts.db:ready: npm run db:init && npm run db:seed
scripts.dev:setup: npm run db:setup && npm run dev:all
